name: Flat Renter Listing Management Backend
author: JH Fahim

sections.description:
The Flat Renter Listing plugin provides a simple yet powerful solution for landlords and property managers to keep track of tenant information within the WordPress backend. It allows users to add, edit, and manage renter details such as personal information, contact details, identification documents, and family members, all securely stored and never displayed on the frontend.

Key Features

  • Manage renter information exclusively in the WordPress backend.
  • Custom post type for renter listings with detailed fields.
  • Add and manage family member details with repeatable fields.
  • Export renter information as a PDF directly from the admin post edit screen.
  • Secure data handling and customizable fields for flexible management.

Core Features List

  • Custom Post Type for Renters
  • Secure and Private Data Management
  • Repeatable Fields for Family Information
  • PDF Export Functionality
  • Customizable Data Fields
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file and upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory. Alternatively, upload from Plugins >> Add New >> Upload Plugin.
  2. Activate the plugin from the Plugins page.
sections.faq:
What is the Flat Renter Listing Plugin?

The Flat Renter Listing Plugin is a WordPress plugin designed to help property owners and managers maintain renter information securely within the WordPress backend, with no display on the frontend.

What information can be managed with this plugin?

  • Renter’s name, contact details, and identification documents.
  • Family member details like name, age, profession, and contact number.
  • Custom fields for additional information.

Can I display renter information on the frontend?

No, this plugin is specifically designed for backend use only, keeping renter information private and secure.

Where can I find support or report issues?

For support or to report any issues, please visit the plugin’s GitHub repository or use the donate link provided.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release with core features for managing renter information.

short_description: Efficiently manage flat renter information from the WordPress backend with a secure and organized system, ideal for landlords and property managers.
